extensionDescription.message: プライベートで隔離されたコンテナーを使用したChromeのようなタブグループ：Firefoxのための究極のタブ管理とグループ。

browserActionPopupTitle.message: Container Tab Groups: ポップアップページ
browserActionPopupTitle.description: Title of the popup page for browserAction.

buttonHideInactiveContainers.message: 他のコンテナーを最小化する
buttonHideInactiveContainers.description: Button label to hide inactive containers on a window.

buttonNewContainer.message: 新しいコンテナーを作成…
buttonNewContainer.description: Button label to create a new container.

buttonCancel.description: Button label to cancel an action.

buttonOk.description: Button label to confirm an action.

newContainerNameLabel.description: Label for inputting the name of a new container.

newContainerNamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the input field of the name of a new container.

newContainerDialogTitle.description: Title of the dialog prompting for creating a new container.

editContainerDialogTitle.description: Title of the dialog prompting for editting a container.

contextMenuHideSelectedContainer.message: このコンテナーを隠す
contextMenuHideSelectedContainer.description: Context menu item text for hiding the container of the selected tab.

tooltipTabPinButton.message: このタブをピン留めする
tooltipTabPinButton.description: Tooltip for the button to pin a tab.

tooltipTabUnpinButton.message: タブのピン留めを外す
tooltipTabUnpinButton.description: Tooltip for the button to unpin a tab.

tooltipHideContainerButton.message: このコンテナーのタブを隠す
tooltipHideContainerButton.description: Tooltip for the button to hide the tabs of a container.

tooltipUnhideContainerButton.message: このコンテナーのタブを表示
tooltipUnhideContainerButton.description: Tooltip for the button to unhide the tabs of a container.

tooltipEditContainerButton.message: このコンテナーを編集
tooltipEditContainerButton.description: Tooltip for the button to edit a container.

currentWindow.description: Title of popup section for the current window.

currentWindowMoreContainers.message: このウィンドウの他のコンテナー
currentWindowMoreContainers.desciption: Title for section listing unused containers for a window.

windowLabel.description: Label for a window with ID.

tooltipWindowLabel.message: ウィンドウ $ID$ に切り替える
tooltipWindowLabel.description: Tooltip for a menu item representing a window.

tooltipContainerCloseAll.message: このコンテナーのタブを全て閉じる
tooltipContainerCloseAll.description: Tooltip for a button to close all tabs of a container.

tooltipContainerDelete.message: このコンテナーを永久に削除する
tooltipContainerDelete.description: Tooltip for a button to permanently delete a container.

confirmContainerDelete.message: 本当にこのコンテナーを永久に削除しますか: $NAME$?
confirmContainerDelete.description: Confirmation message before deleting a container.

defaultContainerName.description: Descriptive default name of a container.

invalidContainerName.message: 利用不能のコンテナー $ID$
invalidContainerName.description: Name shown for an unavailable container.

noContainer.description: Virtual container name for tabs with no container.

browserActionTitle.description: Title of browserAction about tabs and container-based groups.

labelNewTabKeepContainer.message: 新しいタブを現在のコンテナーで開く (粘着コンテナー)
labelNewTabKeepContainer.description: Title of option to always open new tab in current container.

labelFirstPartyIsolate.message: ファーストパーティ分離 (FPI) を有効化する

buttonAboutAddon.message: Container Tab Groups について・評価…
buttonAboutAddon.description: Menu item to open the extension's addons.mozilla.org page.

windowTitlePrefaceTemplate.description: String to add before window title

buttonSettings.description: Menu item to open the extensions's settings.

labelResistFingerprinting.message: Firefoxのフィンガープリント防止機能を有効化する (privacy.resistFingerprinting)

labelDragTabToChangeContainer.message: タブをドラッグしてコンテナーに移動する
labelDragTabToChangeContainer.description: Option to enable the user to drag a tab to move between containers.

optionsHeadingExperimental.description: Heading text of options page for experimental addon features.

optionsHeadingFirefox.description: Heading text of options page for changing Firefox settings.

optionsDescriptionExperimental.message: これらのオプションの一部を無効にすることでバグっぽい動作がみられる場合に対処することができる場合があります．
optionsDescriptionExperimental.description: Description text for experimental features options.

optionsDescriptionFirefox.message: ここでプライバシー関連の隠された Firefox 設定の一部を変更することができます．
optionsDescriptionFirefox.description: Description text for Firefox settings options.

panoramaGrid.description: Panorama Grid page (grid view of container and tabs)

buttonPanorama.message: パノラマ・グリッドを開く
buttonPanorama.description: Button label to open Panorama Grid

buttonOpenTabInContainer.description: Button label to open a new tab in the specified container

buttonTabClose.description: Button label to close a tab.

tooltipCollapseContainers.message: コンテナーを最小化する
tooltipCollapseContainers.description: Tooltip for the button to collapse inactive containers.

tooltipExpandContainers.message: すべてのコンテナーを表示
tooltipExpandContainers.description: Tooltip for the button to expand containers.

titleSelectContainer.description: Title of the popup asking the user to choose a container to open a new tab in.

descriptionSelectContainer.message: あなたは以下の新しいタブを開こうとしています：$URL$．
descriptionSelectContainer.description: Confirmation message before the user chooses a container to open a new tab in.

promptSelectContainer.message: このタブを開くコンテナーを選択してください．
promptSelectContainer.description: Message asking the user to select a container for a new tab.

labelSelectContainerExternalTabs.message: 外部アプリケーションがタブを開くときにコンテナーを選ぶ
labelSelectContainerExternalTabs.description: Option to enable container selection on externally opened tabs.

labelExternalTabSelectContainerOption.message: 外部アプリケーションがタブを開いたとき：
labelExternalTabSelectContainerOption.description: Label for option for handling of externally opened tabs

labelExternalTabOptionChooseContainer.message: 毎回コンテナーを選択する
labelExternalTabOptionChooseContainer.description: Option to choose a container every time an external application opens a tab.

labelExternalTabOptionStickyContainer.message: 最後に使用したコンテナーで開く
labelExternalTabOptionStickyContainer.description: Option to use the last active container for externally opened tabs.

labelExternalTabOptionDisabled.message: デフォルトのコンテナーで開く (コンテナーなし)
labelExternalTabOptionDisabled.description: Option to disable handling of externally opened tabs.

labelGroupIndexOption.message: 各コンテナーに見出しタブを表示する
labelGroupIndexOption.description: Option to show index tabs for containers.

labelGroupIndexOptionAlways.description: Option to show index tabs for all containers.

labelGroupIndexOptionCollapsed.message: 最小化されたコンテナー
labelGroupIndexOptionCollapsed.description: Option to show index tabs for collapsed containers.

labelGroupIndexOptionNever.description: Option to show index tabs for no containers.

optionsHeadingAppearance.description: Heading text of options page for changing appearance settings.

labelPopupSize.message: ポップアップの大きさ

labelPopupSizeStandard.description: Label text for standard popup size.

labelPopupSizeLarge.description: Label text for large popup size.

tooltipCloseWindow.description: Tooltip for a button to close all tabs of a window.

buttonNewWindow.description: Button to open a new window.

optionsHeadingUserData.description: Heading text of options page for managing user data.

labelClearRecentSites.message: 最近訪問したサイトのリストを消去する
labelClearRecentSites.description: Label text for clearing the list of visited sites
